    • Method Detail

      • doesContinentExist

        public static boolean doesContinentExist(GameMap map,
                                         java.lang.String continentName)
        Checks if continent with same name already exists in the map
        Parameters:
        map - GameMap object holding record of all the existing continents and countries
        continentName - name of the continent to be checked
        Returns:
        true if continent already exists, else false

      • doesCountryExist

        public static boolean doesCountryExist(GameMap map,
                                       java.lang.String countryName)
        Checks if country with same name already exists in the same continent.
        Parameters:
        map - GameMap object holding record of all the existing continents and countries
        countryName - name of the country to be checked
        Returns:
        true if country already exists, else false

      • createGraph

        public org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> createGraph(GameMap map)
        Creates a graph representation of the map using JGraphT library. Need to create the map again every time any of the Country object is altered.
        Parameters:
        map - GameMap object whose graph is to be created
        Returns:
        JGraphT type graph representing the GameMap object

      • createGraph

        public org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> createGraph(org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> subGraph,
                                                                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Country> countries)
        Creates a graph representation of the map using JGraphT library. Used for creating sub-graph for a continent
        Parameters:
        subGraph - JGraphT type graph
        countries - List of Country objects in the continent for which sub-graph is being created
        Returns:
        JGraphT type graph representing the argument Continent

      • isGraphConnected

        public boolean isGraphConnected(org.jgrapht.Graph<Country,org.jgrapht.graph.DefaultEdge> graph)
        Checks if entire graph is connected
        Parameters:
        graph - JGraphT graph of the form Graph
        Returns:
        true if graph is connected, else false indicating that graph is invalid

      • continentConnectivityCheck

        public boolean continentConnectivityCheck(GameMap map)
        Checks if all continents are connected sub-graphs or not
        Parameters:
        map - GameMap object representing the game map
        Returns:
        true if all continents are connected sub-graph, else false indicating incorrect map

      • notEmptyContinent

        public boolean notEmptyContinent(GameMap map)
        Check if any continent is empty and does not hold any country.
        Parameters:
        map - GameMap object representing the game map
        Returns:
        true if no continent is empty, else false indicating empty continent

      • fortificationConnectivityCheck

        public boolean fortificationConnectivityCheck(Player player,
                                              java.lang.String fromCountry,
                                              java.lang.String toCountry)
        Check if there is a path of countries between argument fromCountry and argument toCountry such that all the countries in the path are owned by the argument player.
        Parameters:
        player - Player playing the fortify move
        fromCountry - Move armies from this country
        toCountry - Move armies to this country
        Returns:
        true if there exists a path matching required criteria, else false
